title_job: ERP Implementation Specialist for Microsoft D365 in Finance
description: We are seeking an experienced professional familiar with the finance industry to assist in the implementation of Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in financial processes and a proven track record of ERP integration. You will need to have a good understanding of companies that provide financial services, such as loan and mortgage.
